snippet.title: Briefly: Killer Cosplay, Dark Matter Discovery, Silicon Valley Coasters
snippet.content:
Brief news items of note for Lifehacker readers, including: best cosplay from Adelaide's AVCon, scientists's create map of the distribution of dark matter, watch humpback whales 'mug' spectator boats off Sydney.
Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water. Humpback whales are 'mugging' spectator boats off Sydney. []
Adelaide celebrated AVCon last weekend. As always, the cosplay was incredibly impressive. Kotaku has the images. []
Australian scientists just helped to create the most accurate measurement ever made of dark matter structure in the universe. []
Business Insider takes a look inside the world of Silicon Valley's 'coasters' - millionaire engineers who get paid gobs of money and barely work. []
